item.description:
I'm looking for creative ways to keep me motivated to run.. and to stay dedicated. So you guys are gonna help me.  This is gonna be fun. We meet at a pub .. run, jog or walk three miles and then have a beer.

Location to be determined but somewhere in the Plymouth area

The organizer - Adam from Bayside Runners calls is a Beer Run.. I'm gonna call it a "Jog & Grog" .. .

 

I can't do this one - I have a wedding to go to but I wanted to put it out for the group. Adam will be organizing but if anyone from our group wants to take the reins all you have to do is to show up on time.

Thanks everyone

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Pub Run
